itunes:summary: They say the two hardest things in tech are naming things and cache invalidation. Brian Holt (Principal Program Manager at Microsoft) joins BTOP to share a caching incident at Reddit and a frontend engineering perspective on Chaos Engineering.
itunes:subtitle: They say the two hardest things in tech are naming things and cache invalidation. Brian Holt (Principal Program Manager at Microsoft) joins BTOP to share a caching incident at Reddit and a frontend engineering perspective on Chaos Engineering.
